description:
Gaara finally appears in the ninth match, and his opponent is taijutsu (physical technique) specialist Lee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaara Funsai!! Wakasa Da! Power Da! Bakuhatsu Da!
Gaara gegen Rock Lee: Die Kraft der Jugend explodiert
Gaara vs. Rock Lee: The Power of Youth Explodes!
พลังวัยรุ่นระเบิดแล้ว
我愛羅粉砕!! 若さだ! パワーだ! 爆発だ!
